column2: we were seated. There is already a pitcher of water on the table when you arrive
column3: no need to wait for a beverage or refills if you prefer water. Our orders were taken very swiftly. The menu seems pretty small
column4: but there appears to be an option for anything you coukd crave. I ordered the Breakfast Tacos while my boyfriend got the Chicken Fried Steak and Eggs.
